import React from 'react' import "./CartPage.scss" import { useSelector,useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import {formatPrice} from "../../utils/helpers" import { getAllCarts, removeFromCart, toggleCartQty, clearCart, getCartTotal } from '../../store/CartSlice'; // import { shopping_cart } from '../../utils/images' const CartPage = () => { const dispatch=useDispatch(); const carts=useSelector(getAllCarts); const {itemsCount,totalAmount}=useSelector((state)=>state.cart); if(carts.length===0) { return( <> CartPage {/*

Your cart is empty

*/} ) } return (
S.N
Product
Unit Price
Quantity
Total Price
Action
) } export default CartPage
